item.title: Meetings
item.description: Consistent meeting practices are essential for ensuring transparency, efficiency, and accountability within the Aurora TAG.

item.title: GitHub Issues for TAG Actions
item.description: To effectively manage the work of the Aurora Technical Advisory Group (TAG) and ensure decisions lead to tangible actions, GitHub Issues should be used as a tracking tool.

item.title: Architectural Enhancement Proposal (AEP)
item.description: For any significant changes to Auroraâ€™s architecture, a structured and transparent decision-making process is essential.
